body.p: The Security page in Content Fusion allows organization administrators to configure trusted connections for editing and publishing.

section.title: Accessing the Security Page
section.p:
Only users with an Organization Administrator role can access the security management page. To access this page:
Click on your user profile name in the top-right corner of the interface.
Select Manage organization from the drop-down menu.
In the organization management interface, click on Security in the left navigation panel. If you do not see the Manage organization option in your user menu, you do not have administrator privileges for your organization.

section.title: Page Layout and Components
section.p: The Security page provides a way to configure trusted hosts where resources can be retrieved.
The Security page includes the following option:

dlentry.dt: Only allow connections to these trusted hosts (one per line)
dlentry.dd: Administrators can specify a list of DNS names (one per line) that will be trusted and resources can be loaded from the specified hosts. The * wildcard can be used, but only at the beginning of the line.
